remarks: The subfactorial is defined as the number of derangements (see ~ derangval ) of the set ` ( 1 ... N ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jan-2015.)
statement:
derang.d $e |- D = ( x e. Fin |-> ( # ` { f | ( f : x -1-1-onto-> x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) =/= y ) } ) ) $.
subfac.n $e |- S = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( D ` ( 1 ... n ) ) ) $.
subfacval $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> ( S ` N ) = ( D ` ( 1 ... N ) ) ) $.
$d D n $.
$d N f n x y $.
$d S n x y $.
$d f n x y $.
$d f n x y $.
$d f n x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
